title: Riot Games talking in game
body:
So I just played a game and during about half way of it my entire team got a message in chat saying '[Riot Games] We have added a new funny feature! Press enter twice then type fed.' I am unsure if it is just a troll or if something did happen because it was repetitively spammed and sometimes the entire message didn't come through. Riot please answer my question as to why this happened.
Thanks!
Blackhood

replies.body:
As you suspect it is indeed a troll.

It is a trick with white text where they push what they are typing onto the next line, whichever player was typing on the line above is the one doing it. I personally don't know exactly how it works, but it is 100% reportable (impersonating Riot, especially for trolling purposes is a big no no). 

If you have screenshots or have it recorded or something and can see who it was typing then please do submit a support ticket with the evidence so they can look into it, if not, then just be sure to report it in post game if you ever encounter it again.

http://i.imgur.com/5cvcwm7.png
(I encountered this a while ago myself)

^ The Teemo is the culprit here.
